meanings.definition: A telephone line that travels over land.
meanings.sent1: The old house had landlines connecting it to the town.
meanings.sent2: My grandparents still use landlines to make calls.
meanings.sent3: The landlines in the countryside had a chat about the weather.
meanings.sent4: The landlines stretched across the fields like spiderwebs.
meanings.sent5: The landlines hummed with the voices of distant friends.

meanings.definition: The physical infrastructure used for traditional telephone communication.
meanings.sent1: The company invested in upgrading the landlines for better service.
meanings.sent2: The technician checked the landlines for any faults.
meanings.sent3: The landlines decided to take a break and go on strike.
meanings.sent4: The landlines formed a network of communication across the city.
meanings.sent5: The landlines buzzed with the pulse of daily conversations.
